channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Boy’s stabbing and a knifeman at barbershop linked to Cambridgeshire train attack
item.description: Incidents are being investigated as part of the inquiry into Saturday’s mass stabbing on a high-speed train The stabbing of a 14-year-old boy and two ...

item.title: Rome: worker trapped and one injured after part of medieval tower collapses
item.description: Three others rescued at the Torre dei Conti, which was undergoing restoration works Europe live – latest updates A medieval tower in central Rome has ...

item.title: ‘I can’t go on anymore’: Mazón resigns as Valencia leader and acknowledges mistakes during deadly 2024 floods – Europe live
item.description: Mazón faced daily calls for his resignation after flooding in October 2024 killed 229 people in Berlin Elsewhere, Germany’s foreign minister, Johann W...

item.title: US government shutdown nearing record for longest in history as Trump delays food benefits to millions – US politics live
item.description: Republicans claim US president ‘desperate’ to end shutdown, which has now entered 33rd day Looking ahead, on Wednesday, the supreme court will hear ar...

item.title: Farage accused of betraying pensioners after triple lock hint in speech Tories say was rambling and incoherent – UK politics live
item.description: Reform leader refuses to commit to keeping mechanism that guarantees how pensions are increased Farage is speaking now. He says another “depressing bu...

item.title: French climber among at least three killed in Nepal avalanche
item.description: A search is continuing in the Dolakha district for several other foreigners who were accompanied by local guides.

item.title: Israeli military's ex-top lawyer arrested over leak of video allegedly showing Palestinian detainee abuse
item.description: Maj Gen Yifat Tomer-Yerushalmi resigned on Friday, admitting leaking a video allegedly showing abuse of a Palestinian detainee.

item.title: Scunthorpe player and Forest fan among train attack victims
item.description: Scunthorpe United footballer Jonathan Gjoshe, 22 and Nottingham Forest fan Stephen Crean were stabbed.

item.title: No signs 'cruel' alleged McCann stalking would stop, court hears
item.description: A jury has been given legal directions as a trial at Leicester Crown Court enters its fifth week.
